title: How to get folders back on the league of legends client
body:
As we all know and hate, the client has been updated and as a result, some key features have been removed (like folders for organising friends in). As it currently appears, there are 3 folders:

LEAGUE
LEAGUE +
OFFLINE

This will be a step by step guide on how to get them back (it will be like 4 steps, it's kinda simple and I'm upset I didn't find this sooner...).
This worked for me but it may be different for other people but I couldn't find a guide anywhere, not that I looked very hard.

Step 1:
Log into league and go to the base home page
https://imgur.com/yIPTsaB

Step 2:
In the top right, in the "social bar" section, there is an icon called "Options". Click on that.
https://imgur.com/JEGRZTS

Step 3:
Once clicked **UNCHECK ** the option that says "Group Games & Servers".
https://imgur.com/m5syubS

Step 4:
You will now be greeted with your folders.  
https://imgur.com/lCAc7nx

Extra Steps:

To add a new folder:
Step 1:
Go to the social tab again a click on the icon that looks like a folder.
https://imgur.com/l2gtP8R

Step 2:
Once clicked, It will ask you to put in a name for the new folder.
https://imgur.com/v01m8PF

Step 3:
Once you have decided on the name, press "enter" and it will show up in along with the other folders.
https://imgur.com/ho7TeOe

To move a person to a folder:
Step 1:
**Right Click** on there name on your friend's list and move your cursor down to the option titled "move".
https://imgur.com/OmN8uxU

Step 2:
From there, you can select the folder that you would like that player to be moved into.
https://imgur.com/OmN8uxU

Final result
https://imgur.com/E1C6qrd

To rename a folder, simply right click the folder and click on the "Rename Folder" option.
https://imgur.com/yPuv1vC
